content.raw:
ok i see sounds good to me. 

Ya I would expect real time to keep going so we may need to update the calculation of the real time factor to take into the sim time that's been undone. The places I can think of now are gz.cc and TimePanel.cc. Maybe we could just publish this in ~/world_ stats topic
